From: Martin Chandler, To: Elijah H. Chandler and Family Mailed From: June 3, 1916

Mr. E.H. Chandler Pearl, Ill Pike County

June 3rd, 1916 Dearest Folks Just left Seattle at 1 pm on S.S. "Tacoma." Now on Pacific Ocean bound for Portland, ore. Sure great think maybe will go to work in Portland. Don't know for sure yet whether can get on or not. Keep on writing me at Frisco. Received long letter from Grace in Seattle. Martin
